criterion: Provides a clear and concise birth plan template
Includes incorrect or misleading information about birth plan creation
Does not consider the limitations of the small rural clinic
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language
Does not provide a step-by-step birth plan example
Incorrectly assumes that certain interventions are always available
Does not address the user's concern about limited equipment during an emergency C-section
Provides a vague or general response without considering the user's specific situation
Does not clarify what to do in case of an emergency C-section
